item.title: My new project, and some of what's ahead
item.description:
Dear subscriber Link to heading

I haven’t forgotten about you. Quite the contrary â€“ I’ve been meaning to let you know (in a meaningful way) why there have been fewer posts lately. And, to be clear: neither have I stopped writing (again, quite the contrary). I’m not ready to disclose quite yet what I’m working on, but I’ll say this much: It starts with “B”, and ends with “OOK”. That’s right, I’m Forging a Billhook!
